General.Name: Impulse Qingdao Health Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Impulse (Qingdao) Health Tech Co.,Ltd. engages in development, manufacture, and sale of fitness equipment in China and internationally. It offers stair climbers; treadmills; upright, spinning, and recumbent bikes; elliptical and indoor cycles; and strength, group training, and outdoor fitness equipment. The company also provides after-sales services. It serves gyms, governments, enterprises and institutions, military and police units, colleges and universities and other commercial customers and home users. Impulse (Qingdao) Health Tech Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

5.Name: Ms. Rui  Zhang
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
